sentences.sContent: The seats are allotted to the candidates who have won the most votes.
sentences.sCn: 这些席位被分配给了赢得了最多选票的候选人。

words.tran: 分配；分配物；养家费；命运
分配；指派；拨给（allot的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to use a particular amount of time for something, or give a particular share of money, space etc to someone or something
